resources.string: Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MKScannerPro use the Storage and location permission
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MKScannerPro use the bluetooth and location permission
MKScannerPro requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, MKScannerPro cannot be used normally.
After that, MKScannerPro could search and connect with the device
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MKScannerPro use the Location permission
MKScannerPro requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, MKScannerPro cannot be used normally.
MKScannerPro requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, MKScannerPro cannot be used normally.
